## Extract the clustered dynamics from a fitted geneset

The function `plot1GS` returns an object containing the clustered dynamics, letting you identify which probes belong to which dynamics:
```{r, eval=FALSE}
rm(list=ls())
library(TcGSA)
data(data_simu_TcGSA)
tcgsa_sim_1grp <- TcGSA.LR(expr=expr_1grp, gmt=gmt_sim, design=design, 
                          subject_name="Patient_ID", time_name="TimePoint",
                          time_func="linear", crossedRandom=FALSE)
geneclusters <- plot1GS(expr=tcgsa_sim_1grp$Estimations, TimePoint=design$TimePoint, 
       			Subject_ID=design$Patient_ID, gmt=gmt_sim,
       			geneset.name="Gene set 5",
      			 indiv="genes",
       			time_unit="H",
       			lab.cex=0.7
)
geneclusters
```
